function.name: iptcparse
function.description: Parse a binary IPTC http://www.iptc.org/ block into single tags.

function.name: iptcembed
function.description: Embed binary IPTC data into a JPEG image.

function.name: image_type_to_mime_type
function.description: Get Mime-Type for image-type returned by getimagesize, exif_read_data, exif_thumbnail, exif_imagetype.

function.name: getimagesize
function.description: Get the size of an image.
